cancelOrder(String) - Method in class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollection
 
cancelOrderQuery(String) - Method in class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollectionJDBC
Takes the ORder ID searches for it in the DB, than alters the order status column to Cancelled.
changeProductList(LinkedList<Product>) - Method in class OrderSubsystem.Order
Used to changed the product list associated with this order also uses the updateQuantity method to update the Order quantity variable for this Order.
closeConnection() - Method in class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollectionJDBC
Closes the connection for the JDBC in case they haven't been closes already
createOrder(LinkedList<Product>, double, Account) - Method in class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollection
After the Order Object is created with payment information and all requires attributes filled.
createOrderQuery(Order) - Method in class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollectionJDBC
Inserts the Order created by the User into the DB Orders table with all the attributes and values entered by the User
